00038 Client::Client(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_manager_ptr,
00039                struct sockaddr_in &addr, time_t timeout) :
00040                m_conn_manager_ptr(conn_manager_ptr), m_addr(addr),
00041                m_timeout(timeout) {
00042   m_comm = conn_manager_ptr->get_comm();
00043   conn_manager_ptr->add(m_addr, m_timeout, "DFS Broker");
00044 }
00045 
00046 
00047 Client::Client(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_manager_ptr,
00048                PropertiesPtr &props_ptr) :
00049                m_conn_manager_ptr(conn_manager_ptr) {
00050   const char *host;
00051   uint16_t port;
00052 
00053   m_comm = conn_manager_ptr->get_comm();
00054   {
00055     if ((port = (uint16_t)props_ptr->get_int("DfsBroker.Port", 0)) == 0)
00056       throw Exception(Error::DFSBROKER_INVALID_CONFIG,
00057                       "DfsBroker.Port property not specified.");
00058 
00059     if ((host = props_ptr->get("DfsBroker.Host", NULL)) == 0)
00060       throw Exception(Error::DFSBROKER_INVALID_CONFIG,
00061                       "DfsBroker.Host property not specified.");
00062 
00063     if ((m_timeout = props_ptr->get_int("DfsBroker.Timeout", 0)) == 0)
00064       m_timeout = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Request.Timeout", 60);
00065 
00066     InetAddr::initialize(&m_addr, host, port);
00067   }
00068 
00069   conn_manager_ptr->add(m_addr, 10, "DFS Broker");
00070   
00071 }
00072 
00073 Client::Client(Comm *comm, struct sockaddr_in &addr, time_t timeout) :
00074                m_comm(comm), m_conn_manager_ptr(0), m_addr(addr),
00075                m_timeout(timeout) {
00076 }

00079 void
00080 Client::open(const String &name, DispatchHandler *handler) {
00081   CommBufPtr cbufPtr(m_protocol.create_open_request(name, 0));
00082 
00083   try {
00084     send_message(cbufPtr, handler);
00085   }
00086   catch (Exception &e) {
00087     throw Exception(e.code(), format("Error opening DFS file: %s",
00088                     name.c_str()), e);
00089   }
00090 }

00092 
00093 int
00094 Client::open(const String &name) {
00095   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00096   EventPtr eventPtr;
00097   CommBufPtr cbufPtr(m_protocol.create_open_request(name, 0));
00098 
00099   try {
00100     send_message(cbufPtr, &syncHandler);
00101     
00102     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr))
00103       throw Exception(Protocol::response_code(eventPtr.get()),
00104                       m_protocol.string_format_message(eventPtr).c_str());
00105 
00106     return decode_response_open(eventPtr);
00107   }
00108   catch (Exception &e) {
00109     throw Exception(e.code(), format("Error opening DFS file: %s",
00110                     name.c_str()), e);
00111   }
00112 }

00114 
00115 int
00116 Client::open_buffered(const String &name, uint32_t buf_size,
00117                       uint32_t outstanding, uint64_t start_offset,
00118                       uint64_t end_offset) {
00119   try {
00120     int fd = open(name);
00121     {
00122       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00123       HT_EXPECT(m_buffered_reader_map.find(fd) == m_buffered_reader_map.end(),
00124                 Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00125       m_buffered_reader_map[fd] =
00126           new ClientBufferedReaderHandler(this, fd, buf_size, outstanding,
00127                                           start_offset, end_offset);
00128     }
00129     return fd;
00130   }
00131   catch (Exception &e) {
00132     throw Exception(e.code(), format("Error opening buffered DFS file=%s "
00133                                      "buf_size=%u outstanding=%u "
00134                                      "start_offset=%llu end_offset=%llu",
00135                                      name.c_str(), buf_size, outstanding,
00136                                      (Llu)start_offset, (Llu)end_offset), e);
00137   }
00138 }

00150   catch (Exception &e) {

00152                     name.c_str()), e);

00157 int
00158 Client::create(const String &name, bool overwrite, int32_t bufferSize,
00159                int32_t replication, int64_t blockSize) {
00160   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00161   EventPtr eventPtr;
00162   CommBufPtr cbufPtr(m_protocol.create_create_request(name, overwrite,
00163                      bufferSize, replication, blockSize));
00164   try {
00165     send_message(cbufPtr, &syncHandler);
00166 
00167     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr))
00168       throw Exception(Protocol::response_code(eventPtr.get()),
00169                       m_protocol.string_format_message(eventPtr).c_str());
00170 
00171     return decode_response_create(eventPtr);
00172   }
00173   catch (Exception &e) {
00174     throw Exception(e.code(), format("Error creating DFS file: %s", 
00175                     name.c_str()), e);
00176   }

00179 
00180 void
00181 Client::close(int32_t fd, DispatchHandler *handler) {
00182   ClientBufferedReaderHandler *brHandler = 0;
00183   CommBufPtr cbufPtr(m_protocol.create_close_request(fd));
00184   {
00185     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00186     BufferedReaderMapT::iterator iter = m_buffered_reader_map.find(fd);
00187     if (iter != m_buffered_reader_map.end()) {
00188       brHandler = (*iter).second;
00189       m_buffered_reader_map.erase(iter);
00190     }
00191   }
00192   delete brHandler;
00193 
00194   try {
00195     send_message(cbufPtr, handler);
00196   }
00197   catch (Exception &e) {
00198     throw Exception(e.code(), format("Error closing DFS fd: %d", (int)fd), e);
00199   }
00200 }
00201 
00202 
00203 void
00204 Client::close(int32_t fd) {
00205   ClientBufferedReaderHandler *brHandler = 0;
00206   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00207   EventPtr eventPtr;
00208   CommBufPtr cbufPtr(m_protocol.create_close_request(fd));
00209   {
00210     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00211     BufferedReaderMapT::iterator iter = m_buffered_reader_map.find(fd);
00212 
00213     if (iter != m_buffered_reader_map.end()) {
00214       brHandler = (*iter).second;
00215       m_buffered_reader_map.erase(iter);
00216     }
00217   }
00218   delete brHandler;
00219 
00220   try {
00221     send_message(cbufPtr, &syncHandler);
00222 
00223     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr))
00224       throw Exception(Protocol::response_code(eventPtr.get()),
00225                       m_protocol.string_format_message(eventPtr).c_str());
00226   }
00227   catch(Exception &e) {
00228     throw Exception(e.code(), format("Error closing DFS fd: %d", (int)fd), e);
00229   }
00230 }

00246 
00247 size_t
00248 Client::read(int32_t fd, void *dst, size_t len) {
00249   ClientBufferedReaderHandler *brHandler = 0;
00250   {
00251     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00252     BufferedReaderMapT::iterator iter = m_buffered_reader_map.find(fd);
00253 
00254     if (iter != m_buffered_reader_map.end())
00255       brHandler = (*iter).second;
00256   }
00257   try {
00258     if (brHandler)
00259       return brHandler->read(dst, len);
00260       
00261     DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00262     EventPtr eventPtr;
00263     CommBufPtr cbufPtr(m_protocol.create_read_request(fd, len));
00264     send_message(cbufPtr, &syncHandler);
00265 
00266     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr))
00267       throw Exception(Protocol::response_code(eventPtr.get()),
00268                       m_protocol.string_format_message(eventPtr).c_str());
00269 
00270     return decode_response_read(eventPtr, dst, len);
00271   }
00272   catch (Exception &e) {
00273     throw Exception(e.code(), format("Error reading %u bytes from DFS fd %d",
00274                     (unsigned)len, (int)fd), e);
00275   }
00276 }

00279 void
00280 Client::append(int32_t fd, StaticBuffer &buffer, uint32_t flags,
00281                DispatchHandler *handler) {
00282   CommBufPtr cbufPtr(m_protocol.create_append_request(fd, buffer, flags));
00283 
00284   try { send_message(cbufPtr, handler); }
00285   catch (Exception &e) {
00286     throw Exception(e.code(), format("Error appending %u bytes to DFS fd %d",
00287                                      (unsigned)buffer.size, (int)fd), e);
00288   }

00291 
00292 size_t
00293 Client::append(int32_t fd, StaticBuffer &buffer, uint32_t flags) {
00294   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00295   EventPtr eventPtr;
00296   CommBufPtr cbufPtr(m_protocol.create_append_request(fd, buffer, flags));
00297 
00298   try {
00299     send_message(cbufPtr, &syncHandler);
00300 
00301     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr))
00302       throw Exception(Protocol::response_code(eventPtr.get()),
00303                       m_protocol.string_format_message(eventPtr).c_str());
00304     uint64_t offset;
00305     size_t ret = decode_response_append(eventPtr, &offset);
00306 
00307     if (buffer.size != ret)
00308       throw Exception(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, format("tried to append %u "
00309                       "bytes but got %u", (unsigned)buffer.size, (unsigned)ret));
00310     return ret;
00311   }
00312   catch (Exception &e) {
00313     throw Exception(e.code(), format("Error appending %u bytes to DFS fd %d",
00314                                      (unsigned)buffer.size, (int)fd), e);
00315   }
00316 }

00362 
00363 void
00364 Client::remove(const String &name, bool force) {
00365   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00366   EventPtr eventPtr;
00367   CommBufPtr cbufPtr(m_protocol.create_remove_request(name));
00368 
00369   try {
00370     send_message(cbufPtr, &syncHandler);
00371 
00372     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr)) {
00373       int error = Protocol::response_code(eventPtr.get());
00374 
00375       if (!force || error != Error::DFSBROKER_FILE_NOT_FOUND)
00376         throw Exception(error,
00377                         m_protocol.string_format_message(eventPtr).c_str());
00378     }
00379   }
00380   catch (Exception &e) {
00381     throw Exception(e.code(), format("Error removing DFS file: %s",
00382                     name.c_str()), e);
00383   }
00384 }

00399 int
00400 Client::status() {
00401   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer syncHandler;
00402   EventPtr eventPtr;
00403   CommBufPtr cbufPtr(m_protocol.create_status_request());
00404 
00405   try {
00406     send_message(cbufPtr, &syncHandler);
00407 
00408     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr))
00409       throw Exception(Protocol::response_code(eventPtr.get()),
00410                       m_protocol.string_format_message(eventPtr).c_str());
00411 
00412     return decode_response(eventPtr);
00413   }
00414   catch (Exception &e) {
00415     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_ERROR_END;
00416     return e.code();
00417   }
00418 }

00674 void
00675 Client::rename(const String &src, const String &dst) {

00677   EventPtr eventPtr;

00683     if (!syncHandler.wait_for_reply(eventPtr))
00684       throw Exception(Protocol::response_code(eventPtr.get()),
00685                       m_protocol.string_format_message(eventPtr).c_str());
00686   }
00687   catch (Exception &e) {
00688     throw Exception(e.code(), format("Error renaming of DFS path: %s -> %s",
00689                     src.c_str(), dst.c_str()), e);
00690   }
00691 }
00692 
00693 
00694 void
00695 Client::send_message(CommBufPtr &cbufPtr, DispatchHandler *handler) {
00696   int error = m_comm->send_request(m_addr, m_timeout, cbufPtr, handler);
00697 
00698   if (error != Error::OK)
00699     throw Exception(error, format("DFS send_request to %s:%d failed - %s",
00700                     inet_ntoa(m_addr.sin_addr), ntohs(m_addr.sin_port),
00701                     Error::get_text(error)));
00702 }
